name: personal-blog
description: Full-stack personal blog with admin panel

scripts.build: echo 'Starting build process...' && npm run install-backend && echo 'Backend installed' && npm run install-frontend && echo 'Frontend installed' && npm run install-admin && echo 'Admin installed' && npm run build-frontend && echo 'Frontend built' && npm run build-admin && echo 'Admin built' && echo 'Build complete!'
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build verification:' && node -e "console.log('Frontend build exists:', require('fs').existsSync('./frontend/build')); console.log('Admin build exists:', require('fs').existsSync('./admin/build'));"
